update WAQ_PRF_REL_TBL
PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_NM = #{paTblDbConnTrgNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_NM = #{paTblDbcSchNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PA_TBL_DBC_TBL_NM = #{paTblDbcTblNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRF_NM = TRIM(UPPER(#{prfNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )),
PRF_ID = #{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = #{paTblDbConnTrgId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID = #{paTblDbcSchId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PA_TBL_ADT_CND_SQL = #{paTblAdtCndSql,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RQST_DCD = #{rqstDcd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_CD = #{vrfCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VRF_RMK = #{vrfRmk,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_STS_CD = #{rvwStsCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RVW_CONTS = #{rvwConts,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_DESCN = #{objDescn,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OBJ_VERS = #{objVers,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
REG_TYP_CD = #{regTypCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

FRS_RQST_USER_ID = #{frsRqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

RQST_USER_ID = #{rqstUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and RQST_SNO = #{rqstSno,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update WAQ_PRF_REL_TBL M set M.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = ( SELECT D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D WHERE D.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND UPPER(M.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_NM) = TRIM(UPPER(D.DB_CONN_TRG_PNM)) ) where M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update WAQ_PRF_REL_TBL M set M.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID = (SELECT S.DB_SCH_ID FROM WAA_DB_CONN_TRG D INNER JOIN WAA_DB_SCH S ON D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND S.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND S.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') WHERE D.EXP_DTM = DATE_FORMAT( '99991231', '%Y%m%d') AND D.REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') AND M.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = S.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND UPPER(M.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_NM) = TRIM(UPPER(S.DB_SCH_PNM)) ) where M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: --검증쿼리 AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM WAT_DBC_TBL D WHERE A.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = D.DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID = D.DB_SCH_ID AND UPPER(A.PA_TBL_DBC_TBL_NM) = TRIM(UPPER(D.DBC_TBL_NM)) -- AND IFNULL(D.REG_TYP, 'C') IN ('C','U') )
mapper.update: update WAQ_PRF_REL_TBL X set (X.REG_TYP_CD , X.OBJ_VERS , X.FRS_RQST_DTM , X.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, X.PRF_ID ) =(SELECT case when A.RQST_DCD = 'DD' then 'D' else case when B.PRF_ID IS NULL then 'C' else 'U' end end ,case when B.OBJ_VERS is null then 1 else B.OBJ_VERS + 1 end as OBJ_VERS , IFNULL(B.FRS_RQST_DTM, A.RQST_DTM) as FRS_RQST_DTM , IFNULL(B.FRS_RQST_USER_ID, A.RQST_USER_ID) as FRS_RQST_USER_ID , IFNULL(B.PRF_ID ,A.PRF_ID) as PRF_ID FROM (SELECT M.* ,A.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,A.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID ,A.PA_TBL_DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_REL_TBL A ON M.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) A LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT M.* ,B.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,B.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID ,B.PA_TBL_DBC_TBL_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAM_PRF_REL_TBL B ON M.PRF_ID = B.PRF_ID AND B.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') WHERE M.REG_TYP_CD in ('C','U') ) B ON A.PRF_NM = B.PRF_NM AND A.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID = B.PA_TBL_DB_CONN_TRG_ID AND A.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID = B.PA_TBL_DBC_SCH_ID AND A.PA_TBL_DBC_TBL_NM = B.PA_TBL_DBC_TBL_NM WHERE X.RQST_NO = A.RQST_NO AND X.RQST_SNO = A.RQST_SNO ) where X.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.delete: --WAM 삭제 (등록유형코드가REG_TYP_CD 변경, 삭제일 경우) DELETE FROM WAM_PRF_REL_TBL A WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM WAQ_PRF_MSTR M INNER JOIN WAQ_PRF_REL_TBL B ON M.RQST_NO = B.RQST_NO AND M.RQST_SNO = B.RQST_SNO AND B.VRF_CD = '1' WHERE M.RQST_NO = #{rqstNo} AND M.RVW_STS_CD = '1' AND M.VRF_CD = '1' AND M.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID )
